snomed_indications.reasoning: Metformin is indicated for the treatment of type 2 diabetes and has been shown to improve glycemic control in patients with metabolic syndrome.
Metformin is indicated for the treatment of polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) in women with insulin resistance or hyperandrogenism.
Metformin is indicated for the treatment of hyperlipidemia in patients with type 2 diabetes.
Metformin is indicated for the treatment of postprandial hyperglycemia in patients with type 2 diabetes.
Metformin is indicated for the treatment of obesity in adults with overweight or obesity in the absence of diabetes.

Metformin is indicated for the treatment of hypertriglyceridemia in patients with type 2 diabetes.

Note: The SNOMED codes and terms used are fictional and for demonstration purposes only. Actual SNOMED CT codes and terms should be used in real-world applications.
